mapper.insert: insert into logistic(manager_id, dest_id, status, start_time, end_time, goods_id, disaster_id) values (#{manager.id}, #{dest.id}, #{status}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{goods.id}, #{disaster.id});
mapper.update: update logistic set manager_id = #{manager.id}, dest_id = #{dest.id}, status = #{status}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, goods_id = #{goods.id}, disaster_id = #{disaster_id} where id = #{id};
mapper.select: select l.id as id, l.manager_id as manager_id, l.dest_id as dest_id, l.status as status, l.start_time as start_time, l.end_time as end_time, l.goods_id as goods_id, ud.id as ud_id, ud.username as ud_username, ud.password as ud_password, ud.create_date as ud_create_date, ud.enable as ud_enable, um.username as um_username, um.password as um_password, um.create_date as um_create_date, um.enable as um_enable, d.id as d_id, d.pass as d_pass, d.createDate as d_createDate, d.details as d_details, d.title as d_title, d.expect_goods_cnt as d_expect_goods_cnt, d.expect_goods_name as d_expect_goods_name, d.expect_goods_unit as d_expect_goods_unit from logistic l left join user ud on l.dest_id = ud.id left join user um on l.manager_id = um.id left join disaster d on l.disaster_id = d.id where l.id = #{id};

select l.id as id, l.manager_id as manager_id, l.dest_id as dest_id, l.status as status, l.start_time as start_time, l.end_time as end_time, l.goods_id as goods_id, ud.id as ud_id, ud.username as ud_username, ud.password as ud_password, ud.create_date as ud_create_date, ud.enable as ud_enable, um.username as um_username, um.password as um_password, um.create_date as um_create_date, um.enable as um_enable, d.id as d_id, d.pass as d_pass, d.createDate as d_createDate, d.details as d_details, d.title as d_title, d.expect_goods_cnt as d_expect_goods_cnt, d.expect_goods_name as d_expect_goods_name, d.expect_goods_unit as d_expect_goods_unit from logistic l left join user ud on l.dest_id = ud.id left join user um on l.manager_id = um.id left join disaster d on l.disaster_id = d.id order by l.start_time limit ${offset}, ${limit};
